TopicTitle: Spider's Vehicle Factory - Prime series Trucks

Articles.Content:
Introducing my Vehicle factory with vehicles that will probably make most of your drivers and pilots scream in panic, well unless they're Jeb. Ranging from ground to the sky, or even space (we're not there, yet, hold your horse-style rovers.) These have had appeared through KLF, and now I've decided to share them here as well.

Introducing the Prime Haulers:

These vehicles stemmed from the need to pull things to and fro. and maybe from a need to encase the Command chairs in-case of collisions, while not needing very much in hardware performance. Their wheels are placed on Hex cores, so you'd know where you can place wheels you want to use.

Highest parts count is 166.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Bawx! <--dash-

There is a model 2, just not restored yet, if I can. If there's a mod part I missed while Vanillafying models 1-3, let me know. (otherwise I can take the last sentence down)

Edited January 7, 2015 by PanWieldingMann
minor adjustments
